selected_quotes: New paper: #deeplearning models that use an NLP analogy to incorporate prior physics knowledge.
New lease on life for tree recursive neural nets describing physics of jets in LHC.
Harry Potter And The Qcd-Aware Recursive Neural Networks For Jet Physics #science
beautiful generalization of natural language grammars. dynamic computational graphs really shine her…
words, particles, ... who can tell the difference? :)
